objects.name: Analytic 0996
objects.description: Monitors execution of older or legacy interpreters (e.g., python2, bash with restricted history logging), downgrade of TLS/SSL configurations, or forced fallback to unencrypted protocols. Detects suspicious reconfiguration of kernel modules or boot loaders to reduce integrity controls.

x_mitre_log_source_references.name: auditd:SYSCALL
x_mitre_log_source_references.channel: execve: Execution of downgraded interpreters such as python2 or forced fallback commands

x_mitre_log_source_references.name: linux:syslog
x_mitre_log_source_references.channel: Kernel or daemon warnings of downgraded TLS or cryptographic settings

x_mitre_mutable_elements.description: List of TLS/SSL versions approved for use; alerts triggered if older protocols (e.g., TLS 1.0) are used.
